content.raw: Because we are averaging over the ambient and diffuse vectors for each visual. If there are `n` visuals in the link and `m` links, there will be `2nm` vectors to average over. Thus we add two to `numVis` per every visual because we've added the ambient and diffuse color vectors. The variable name is a bit misleading, I can add a comment or change the variable name.
content.html: Because we are averaging over the ambient and diffuse vectors for each visual. If there are n visuals in the link and m links, there will be 2nm vectors to average over. Thus we add two to numVis per every visual because we've added the ambient and diffuse color vectors. The variable name is a bit misleading, I can add a comment or change the variable name.
